author: sorcerykid
long_description:
Advanced Rangefinder extends the Minetest API with more powerful search capabilities for both nodes and entities, in addition to a versatile chat command for use in testing.

The following issue on GitHub served as inspiration for developing this mod:  
[https://github.com/minetest/minetest/issues/9403](https://github.com/minetest/minetest/issues/9403)

Demonstration of Rangefinder Mod  
[https://vimeo.com/392304134](https://vimeo.com/392304134)

For detailed usage instructions, please refer to the forum topic.
name: finder
short_description: Extends the Minetest API with search capabilities for entities
title: Advanced Rangefinder
